other_tests.findings: Extraluminal collection of the left pericolic gutter adjacent to the iliacus muscle contains fluid, bubbles of gas, and a small amount of hyperdensity possibly extravasated oral contrast. The collection increased in size from 4.3 x 2.3 cm to 4.6 x 3.3 cm.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The collection has increased in size despite the presence of the drainage catheter. Local inflammatory stranding has worsened.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT of the abdomen with IV contrast
other_tests.findings: Colonic wall thickening of the sigmoid and distal descending colon; atrophic appearance of kidneys stable; occlusion of the abdominal aorta redemonstrated; collection size has increased.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Compared to previous exam, the collection has increased in size, with local inflammatory stranding worsening.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT of the pelvis with IV contrast
other_tests.findings: Sigmoid colonic wall thickening unchanged; low-density fluid collection anterior to the rectum slightly smaller (3.4 x 1.5 cm from 3.8 x 1.9 cm).
other_tests.changes_over_time: The size of the low-density fluid collection anterior to the rectum has decreased.
